title.en: Prayer to Shechen Öntrul Gyurme Tutob Namgyal

text.en: With thepowerof awakening in the essence of thechangelessfour kāyas
And thestrengthof loving compassion towards those in conditioned existence,
You have arisen as a mahāpaṇḍitavictoriousover all—
Jamgön Lama, 'gentle protector-guru', to you I pray!
text.en-trans: yong shar jamgön lamar solwa deb
